publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2511 Robert Brown on behalf of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body: Scottish Commission for Public Audit—That the Parliament agrees to the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body’s proposal to appoint George Lyon to be a member of the Scottish Commission for Public Audit.

S2M-2511 Robert Brown on behalf of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body: Scottish Commission for Public Audit—That the Parliament agrees to the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body’s proposal to appoint George Lyon to be a member of the Scottish Commission for Public Audit.

S2M-2511 Robert Brown on behalf of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body:Scottish Commission for Public Audit—That the Parliament agrees to the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body’s proposal to appoint George Lyon to be a member of the Scottish Commission for Public Audit.
